body:
还是多线程吧，保证流程的简单性。
一库多表，在性能上没有什么优势。只是一种过渡阶段。没必要为一个过渡阶段。多实现一个流程。
please ignore find-bug's warn
duplicate with #501

@terrymanu 本来想着，来找找新版本，却发现日志被取消了。。。做了简要说明，麻烦有时间确认下。
>说明：
表名重写有两种可能
1. 存在配置的表
2. 缺省配置的表
针对第一类，通过配置确实可以调整，这个我之前也是知道的，但对于项目来说并不是所有的表均需要添加分表的逻辑，那么处理第二类时，我验证过，存在**表名被转为小写的情况**

>复现

[link](https://github.com/neo37927/sharding-jdbc-example.git)：https://github.com/neo37927/sharding-jdbc-example.git
branch:reproduce-example-codes
取消了对T_ORDER的路由配置。

> 部分报错日志

1.Insert--------------
[INFO ] 2018-03-05 11:36:00,710 --main-- [Sharding-JDBC-SQL] Logic SQL: 
INSERT INTO T_ORDER (
          user_id, status
        )
        VALUES (
        ?,
        ?
        ) 
/*省略部分*/
[INFO ] 2018-03-05 11:36:00,713 --main-- [Sharding-JDBC-SQL] Actual SQL: ds_0 ::: 
INSERT INTO t_order (
          user_id, status
        )
        VALUES (
        ?,
        ?
        ) ::: [51, INSERT_TEST]

现状：
目前通过factory创建datasource需要本地配置，如果本地不存在配置文件创建datasource时会抛空指针异常
提议：
1、创建datasource可以不传入sharding rule，data sources等信息
2、在OrchestrationFacade的init方法中添加从配置中心加载配置的逻辑
3、如果本地配置和从注册中心加载的配置不一样触发datasource的renew方法

关于ExecutorEngine的close方法
建议先调用shutdown方法等待已经入队的任务执行完毕
然后调用awaitTermination方法等待一定时间
如果等待结束或出现异常调用shutdownNow并处理对shutdownNow返回的未执行的任务的处理
以上执行后还是没有关闭的抛出ShardingJdbcException（抛异常的同时还要创建线程用来关闭ExecutorEngine以及重新创建ExecutorEngine来处理后续任务）

其中等待时间和是否调用shutdownNow建议增加配置交给使用者来决定
建议亮哥优先考虑下支持透传方式执行sql，这样sharding-jdbc短时间不支持批量insert方式也能够通过透传方式，完成单一物理表的批量insert，毕竟在数据量较大的时候批量insert执行效率比一条一条的插入好太多。
Closing. The teams are on building.

通过jdbc可以获取事务隔离级别么，如果可以，可以试试sharding jdbc能否取到？

We do not test for  geography and jsonb data type. 
If use them for sharding columns, sharding-jdbc cannot support; If use them for non-sharding  columns, maybe fine.
If you interested, cloud you just test them? Thank you.
Please reopen the issue if you want discuss further.

测试下来是有问题的  上面贴出来的解析出来的DMLStatement可以看出来  看上去值的对应关系是错误的
在进行db的路由时 使用了standard strategy 只根据上面sql中user_new_id来进行路由的
在进行table的路由时 使用了complex strategy  根据user_new_id, guid, create_time来进行路由的 

我测下来 在进行db路由时  user_new_id取到的值是其他column的值

druid数据源和jdbc都是可以的，我们尝试修改了数据库的全局事务隔离级别，在druid或jdbc上都能正确反映出来。
而sharding-jdbc不行，主要原因来至于sharding-jdbc中AbstractConnectionAdapter transactionIsolation使用的是TRANSACTION_READ_UNCOMMITTED，在并未手动设置sharding-jdbc连接时的事务隔离级别情况下 取到的就是TRANSACTION_READ_UNCOMMITTED 这个默认值，并非为数据库中设置的事务隔离级别
@terrymanu 您可否确认一下git操作流程，issue被您关闭的，我是无法再次打开的。

OK， At github, you can only re-open your own issues if you closed them yourself.
I will reopen that issue.
By the way, the standard process is really important. Our proposal is collaborate this open source project with community, so we need a clear rule.

We should make clear with rule here.
If use default data source or use database sharding only, the actual data nodes can absent, the default value is all real data sources + low case real table names.
It is a problem if data base is case sensitive, the solution is configure the actual data nodes for now.

I see the error in your log:

```
 jdbcUrl is required with driverClassName.
```

I think you miss to configure the properties for jdbcUrl, it not a sharding jdbc problem.

ok, this is a enhancement. we will do it on next release.
Or you can give us a pull request if you want.

We don't consider about some special data types indeed.
We can enhance some one in future. If you interested on this, welome give us a pull request.
thanks!  it is urgent for me, so I would like to support the data types by myself first.
随手记 www.sui.com
after verification work, then I will register a pull request.
#501 is still opening. The status of finished features should be closed
please faq：http://shardingjdbc.io/docs_cn/01-start/faq/
duplicate with #571
Please reference issue template, provide source code to be reproduce. Thank you.

Thank you for your contribution. I reviewed the codes and give some suggestion:

1. Please revise your code reference code convention: http://shardingjdbc.io/community/en/02-contribute/convention/
2. Please review your code reference checkstyle, the template is in sharding-jdbc/src/resources/dd_checks.xml.
3. Please remove all commits, javadoc(test case do not need javadoc)  and all Chinese words.
4. Please fill all SQL type for your assert.xml to make sure test engine is correct, for example: DQL,DQM,DDL,TCL,DAL
5. Missing some assert at parse context(for example missing condition assert here), please check SQLStatement and his child class to make sure all properties we need to assert.
6. Still need to consider about how to assert DML,DDL, TCL and DAL. expected-data-file only for DQL and DML.
7. Finally, fill all test case for xml (can do it after merged).
@jixiaod  你什么问题

@jixiaod 
改成编程方式调用啊，你看看 shardingjdbc的文档， 那里有编程方式怎么调用，你只要通过shardingjdbc return 一个 datasource就可以了 这个datasource就可以当成一个bean被boot自动注入使用

@aaa5131421 
把pom.xml的删除，就好了……

      <dependency>
            <groupId>io.shardingjdbc</groupId>
            <artifactId>sharding-jdbc-core-spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
            <version>2.0.3</version>
        </dependency>
已解决

求高手！！！
开源不易，我们希望将精力放在完成新功能和解决有价值的问题上，为了让大家的配合更具有效率，请填写以下列出的全部问题。为了节省复现问题的时间，请务必提供可重现的代码，否则我们会将issue直接标记为invalid并关闭

reported by #645
fixed at 3.0.0.M1

Integrate test engine's folder structure：

```
integrate
  -- config
      -- ${rule-name}.{db-type}.yaml    (+)
  -- init
      -- ${db-name}.xml                 (+)
  -- expected
      -- ${expected-name}.xml           (+)
  -- assert
      -- dql
          -- ${assert-type}.xml         (+)
      -- dml
          -- ${assert-type}.xml         (+)
      -- ddl
          -- ${assert-type}.xml         (+)
      -- tcl
          -- ${assert-type}.xml         (+)
      -- dal
          -- ${assert-type}.xml         (+)
```

rule-name enum: sharding-tables, sharding-databases, sharding-databases-tables, master-slave, master-slave-sharding-tables, master-slave-sharding-databases, master-slave-sharding-databases-tables.

assert-type example: simple-select, group-by-select, update, create, etc.

xml example for init & expected: ```xml
```

xml example for assert: 

```xml
<asserts>
    <assert id="test" expected-data-file="xxx.xml">
        <sql>select order_id,user_id from t_order where order_id in (%s,%s,%s)</sql>
        <parameters>
            <parameter value="1000" type="int"/>
            <parameter value="1101" type="int"/>
            <parameter value="2200" type="int"/>
        </parameters>
        <parse-context>
            <tables>
                <table name="t_order" />
            </tables>
            <table-tokens>
                <table-token begin-position="40" original-literals="t_order" />
            </table-tokens>
            <conditions>
            	...
            </conditions>
        </parse-context>
    </assert>

    <assert id="test2" expected-data-file="xxx.xml" expected-update-count="1">
        <sql>update t_order set user_id = 10111 where order_id = %s</sql>
        <expected-sql>select order_id,user_id from t_order where order_id = %s</expected-sql>
        <parameters>
            <parameter value="1000" type="int"/>
        </parameters>
        <parse-context>
            ...
        </parse-context>
    </assert>
</asserts>
```

Load init-data automatically.

I checkout the code, you are correct. we should add @EqualsAndHashCode on other SelectItem.
Cloud you test on this and submit a pull request for us? welcome to be a contributor.
